com.mycompany

Class DatabaseManagerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.DatabaseManagerResource

  • @Path(value="mongodb")
public class DatabaseManagerResource
extends Object
    This REST Web Service is used to perform read and write operation on the db based on a quorum protocol
    Author:
    Orazio, Alessandro

      • dropCollections

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="collections/drop")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public String dropCollections()
        Drops replicas' databases collections. NB: for develop use only.
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation

      • getCollection

        @GET
 @Path(value="collections/{collection_name}")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public String getCollection(@PathParam(value="collection_name")
                                                                                                              String collectionName)
        Retrieves all documents in the specified collection
        Parameters:
        collectionName - the name of the db collection
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation and the collection's documents

      • getLastCommittedDocument

 @Path(value="collections/{collection_name}/lastCommittedDocument")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public String getLastCommittedDocument(@PathParam(value="collection_name")
                                                                                                                                               String collectionName)

        Returns:

      • twoPhaseCommitWrite

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
 @Path(value="collections/write")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public String twoPhaseCommitWrite(@FormParam(value="collection_name")
                                                                                                                                                               String collectionName,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="directory")
                                                                                                                                                               String directory,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="cycle")
                                                                                                                                                               int cycle,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="mean_add")
                                                                                                                                                               double meanAdd,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="mean_download")
                                                                                                                                                               double meanDownload,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="stddev_add")
                                                                                                                                                               double stdDevAdd,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="stddev_download")
                                                                                                                                                               double stdDevDownload,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="state")
                                                                                                                                                               int state,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="timestamp")
                                                                                                                                                               String timestamp)
        Start a 2PC to insert a new entry in the db
        Parameters:
        collectionName - the name of the db collection
        directory - directory of the submitted test
        cycle - cycle of the submitted test
        meanAdd - Mean Execution time for the add operations in the submitted test
        meanDownload - Standard Deviation of Execution time for the download operations in the submitted test
        stdDevAdd - Standard Deviation of Execution time for the add operations in the submitted test
        stdDevDownload - Standard Deviation of Execution time for the download operations in the submitted test
        state - state of the submitted test
        timestamp - timestamp of the submitted test
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation
